Alex Gibson’s Dev Blog

Hello there. I'm a front–end developer living in Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom. I spend most of my time hacking on mobile browsers, and I maintain several open source projects on GitHub including tap.js and shake.js. I also help out as a co-maintainer on the HTML5 Mobile Boilerplate project.
